creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: red cloth with two horizontal green bands (approximately 2-1/2"); cloth is patterned with diamond stitching in orange with repeating interior diamond pattern in green, yellow and white on one half; other half has multicolored zigzag pattern in same colors
title: Woman's breast cover
